snippet: The Web site is asking contributors to nominate "history books that no one should take seriously,'' with the winner scheduled to be announced on July 16.
abstract: The Web site is asking contributors to nominate "history books that no one should take seriously,'' with the winner scheduled to be announced on July 16.

headline.main: History News Network Celebrates Bad History Books
headline.print_headline: Web Site Asks Readers For Bad History Books
